data.title: ROBERT MUSIL, MASTER OF THE HOVERING LIFE, A STUDY OF THE MAJOR FICTION by Frederick G. Peters: Very Good + Hardcover (1978) First edition.
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780231044769 - First edition. - Hardcover - Columbia University Press, New York - 1978 - Condition: Very Good + - 6 x 9 in. Brown cloth boards. Condition is VERY GOOD+ ; corners bumped, minor wear, covers clean. Binding tight and text unmarked, PO's name on front pastedown. Lit Crit. Stax. - ROBERT MUSIL, MASTER OF THE HOVERING LIFE, A STUDY OF THE MAJOR FICTION

Terms of Sale:

All subject to prior sale. Maine residents

pay 5% sales tax. Payment accepted by check, money order,

Visa/Mastercard/American

Express

and Paypal. Payment expected within 7 days. Customer pays shipping charges.

Contact info:

Andre Strong

PO box 1300

Blue Hill ME 04614

USA

andrestrongbooks@gmail.com

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books

weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact

you to let you know extra shipping is required.
